dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Informational and conversational, like a financial news recap.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2021, the Dow Jones industrial average soared 425 points on Thursday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty twenty one, the Dow Jones industrial average soared four hundred twenty five points on Thursday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average soared 420 points, or 1.4%, Wednesday, while the S&P 500, which broke a five-day losing streak on Tuesday, and the tech-heavy Nasdaq climbed 1.1% and 1%, respectively.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the S&P 500 broke its five-day losing streak too—up 1.1%.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the S&P five hundred broke its five-day losing streak too-up one point one percent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average soared 420 points, or 1.4%, Wednesday, while the S&P 500, which broke a five-day losing streak on Tuesday, and the tech-heavy Nasdaq climbed 1.1% and 1%, respectively.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But tech stocks like Apple and Amazon, um, they actually fell about 1% that same day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But tech stocks like Apple and Amazon, um, they actually fell about one percent that same day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Technology stocks, on the other hand, continued to slip: Apple, Amazon and Facebook all fell close to 1% Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, while energy companies like Occidental Petroleum were up big time—8% for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, while energy companies like Occidental Petroleum were up big time-eight percent for them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Energy firms continued to head up market gains, with Occidental Petroleum, EOG Resources and Cabot Oil & Gas up 8%, 7% and 6%, respectively; the S&P 500 Energy Index has soared 27% this yearmore than double the return of any other sector over the same period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's Fisker Inc., which jumped nearly 40% after announcing a deal with Foxconn.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's Fisker Inc., which jumped nearly forty percent after announcing a deal with Foxconn.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Elsewhere in the market, Tesla rival Fisker Inc. soared nearly 40%, surpassing a record high from November, after announcing a collaboration with Taiwanese manufacturer Foxconn on a new electric vehicle project.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, the electric vehicle project. Meanwhile, uh, Block's stock sank 6% after they doubled down on bitcoin.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, the electric vehicle project. Meanwhile, uh, Block's stock sank six percent after they doubled down on bitcoin.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shares of payments fintech Square, meanwhile, sank about 7% after the firm disclosed in a better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings report that it has doubled down on a $50 million bitcoin investment from October, purchasing $170 million more of the worlds largest cryptocurrency since.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They bought another $175 million worth, right? Even though bitcoin had dropped from its high.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They bought another one hundred seventy five dollars million worth, right? Even though bitcoin had dropped from its high.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shares of payments fintech Square, meanwhile, sank about 7% after the firm disclosed in a better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings report that it has doubled down on a $50 million bitcoin investment from October, purchasing $170 million more of the worlds largest cryptocurrency since.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And Treasury yields rose to 1.5%, which, you know, usually means investors are a bit nervous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And Treasury yields rose to one point five percent, which, you know, usually means investors are a bit nervous.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Yields on the ten-year Treasurywhich moves inversely to stocksrose 50 basis points Wednesday morning to 1.4%, tacking on to their highest level since last February following congressional testimony from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, who insisted Tuesday that monetary policy would remain accommodative despite inflationary concerns.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Powell tried to calm things down though, saying policy would stay accommodative.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Powell tried to calm things down though, saying policy would stay accommodative.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Yields on the ten-year Treasurywhich moves inversely to stocksrose 50 basis points Wednesday morning to 1.4%, tacking on to their highest level since last February following congressional testimony from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, who insisted Tuesday that monetary policy would remain accommodative despite inflationary concerns.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But analysts like Craig Erlam are calling it a choppy period—inflation fears are really driving the volatility.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But analysts like Craig Erlam are calling it a choppy period-inflation fears are really driving the volatility.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Were going through a very choppy period in the markets, with investors uncertain how to read the movements were seeing in bond markets, Oanda Senior Market Analyst Craig Erlam said Wednesday morning. The curve is steepening, and investors are fretting a little about the prospect of higher inflation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And MicroStrategy went and bought even more bitcoin—over a billion dollars' worth while prices dipped.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And MicroStrategy went and bought even more bitcoin-over a billion dollars' worth while prices dipped.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Publicly traded MicroStrategy, one of the largest corporate bitcoin investors, said Wednesday morning it spent approximately $1 billion to acquire 19,452 more bitcoin tokens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wild. So it seems like everyone's just trying to figure out if inflation is temporary or here to stay.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild. So it seems like everyone's just trying to figure out if inflation is temporary or here to stay.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's gonna be a jumpy year in the markets, no doubt.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's gonna be a jumpy year in the markets, no doubt.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This may make for a jumpy year in the markets, with any signs of inflation seeing jitters quickly return and any rallies to stall, just as were experiencing at the moment, he notes.
